rata sanwardhanaya kara gaman kirimedi me rate rajya sewakayan anadena niladhari washayen kriya kala yuthu bawa sihipath kala ee mahatha ee wenuwen awankawa peni sitiya yuthu bawath thawaduratath shakthimathwa katayuthu kirimen ape aramuna kara itha ikmanin langawiya haki bawath penwa dunneya.thawada rajya sewakayan ha deshapalagnyayan athara dadi sabandathawak thibiya yuthu bawa awadharanaya kala janadhipathiwaraya ratak gana sithana wita apita deshapalanaya pilibandawa sithiya nohaki bawath mathru bhumiyedi rajya prathipaththiyak thibena bawath kiya sitiyeya.nathawage watup labana rajya sewakayan ee nisama owun wenuwen honda sewayak labadiya yuthu bawa ki ee mahatha rajya sewakayan labadun sahayogaya matha me dakwa pamina thibena bawada wadiduratath pawasiya.ayi. es. oo. 9001 – 2008 anthar jathika thaththwa sahathika labagath kolambaa, kaluthara ha hambanthota disthrik lekam karyalada bambalapitiya, ambalangoda, nagoda, gangawatakorale, homagama, kaduwela, kolonnawa, rathmalana, maharagama, kasbawa, padukka, thimbairigasyaya, shri jayawardhanapura kotte, dehiwala, moratuwa, sithawaka ha kolambaa pradeshiya lekam karyalada mehidi janadhipathiwaraya athin sammana laba gathi.
